name: Perseus (namesBlue)
description:
Perseus Description

It is a 2D platformer puzzle game which has a creative narrative design and gameplay design.

Distribution
  • Design: namesBlue
  • UI: namesBlue
  • Art: credit to Szadi Art. - Asset Store (unity.com) & 2D Pixel Unit Maker - SPUM | 2D 角色 | Unity Asset Store
  • Story: Wang Xinzhi
  • Music & Audio: Wang Xinzhi
  • Programming: Xu Xiangyu
Development Document Notice

There are actually an opening video and an ending video but they are unable to be shown through webGL (I will make efforts to fix it), so if you want to see the videos you can download the executable file from the link or watch the speedrun video. Hope there won't be any confusion. Enjoy!
